crypto.name: Base X
crypto.desc:
Is X truly random? Perhaps not, if you carefully observe the characters I’ve chosen.

Author: Abu

crypto.name: Color Blind
crypto.desc:
Picasso’s final mystery lies in his colors.

Author: Abu

crypto.name: Hertz
crypto.desc:
"Machines take me by suprise with great frequency" - Alan Turing

Author: Abu

crypto.name: I Lost My Bottoms
crypto.desc:
Oops!! I lost my bottoms. Are you good enough to find them?

Author : ctfguy

crypto.name: OG Fermat
crypto.desc:
It is impossible for any number which is a power greater than the second to be written as a sum of two like powers. I have a truly marvelous demonstration of this proposition which this margin is too narrow to contain.

Author: Abu

crypto.name: Rated R
crypto.desc:
"Enjoy the phase, as the journey is far more enjoyable than the destination." - SSR

Author: Abu

crypto.name: The Real Crypto
crypto.desc:
Finally some real crypto you guys asked for. Good Luck.

Author: ctfguy

crypto.name: win
crypto.desc:
I choose a lazy person to do a hard job. Because a lazy person will find an easy way to do it.

Author: Abu

forensic.name: Blimey
forensic.desc:
"I don't pretend to be captain weird. I just do what I do." - Johnny Depp

Author: Abu

forensic.name: Captain Cool
forensic.desc:
"It is better to keep your mouth closed and let people think you are a fool than to open it and remove all doubt." - Mark Twain

All that is good, but Thala spoke the golden words d-e-f-i-n-i-t-e-l-y-n-o-t.

Author: Abu

forensic.name: Empty
forensic.desc:
"When one's expectations are reduced to zero, one really appreciates everything one does have." - Stephen Hawking

Author: Abu

forensic.name: Evolve
forensic.desc:
“Civilization is the subordination of the individual to the welfare of the community.” - Charles Fourier

Author: Abu

forensic.name: Ghost IP
forensic.desc:
An intruder is scanning your server. Uncover their true IP address by analyzing logs and tracing packets before they strike. Can you reveal the shadow lurking in your network?

Author: Rohmat

forensic.name: Khabib
forensic.desc:
"I don't fight for the money. I fight for my legacy. I fight for history. I fight for my people." - Khabib Nurmagomedov

True to his words, the Eagle was one to watch out for, especially if you know where to look.

Author: Abu

hw.name: Layered Circuits
hw.desc: Layers conceal the flag you seek, decode the PCB to speak.

misc.name: QRco
misc.desc:
A seemingly innocuous QR code holds the key to a puzzle concealed in plain sight. Your quest begins with the scan of a code that unveils a document shrouded in mystery.

Author: SHL

osint.name: Sins of the Shepherd
osint.desc:
A renowned investigator is unraveling the chilling mystery of a Korean pastor from Gardena, California, who murdered his family before taking his own life. But this case runs deeper—clues point to sensitive information hidden within the church's official website. Uncover the digital secrets the pastor left behind and help the investigator solve the case.

Can you find the username and password buried in the shadows.

Authors: MrGhost, Abu

pwn.name: Crack
pwn.desc:
"Shall I, that have destroyed my Preservers, return home?" - Alexander the Great

Author: Josh

pwn.name: Question
pwn.desc:
“Life is not a period or a question mark. It’s an exclamation point” — Bashar

Author: tourpran

rev.name: Bitwise Mystery
rev.desc:
This challenge obscures the flag using a combination of bit shifts and character manipulation. Discover how the paired characters are transformed and recover the hidden message!

Author : PattuSai

rev.name: Eich
rev.desc:
"Technology is only as good as the people behind it" - Brendan Eich

Author: Abu

rev.name: Exponential Enigma
rev.desc:
In this challenge, exponential sequences hold the key to unlocking an encoded message. Follow the power trail to figure out how the message has been transformed, and reveal the flag!

Author : PattuSai

rev.name: Horcrux
rev.desc:
"Yer a wizard Harry" ― Rubeus Hagrid

rev.name: Hykes
rev.desc:
"If you change the way you look at things, the things you look at change" - Wayne Dyer

rev.name: Scrambled Pathways
rev.desc:
In this challenge, characters follow a hidden pattern as they traverse columns. Figure out how to untangle the message and reveal the flag!
